zope.security.simplepolicies¶

Simple ‘ISecurityPolicy’ implementations.

class zope.security.simplepolicies.ParanoidSecurityPolicy(*participations)[source]¶

Bases: object

Prohibit all access exctp to public items, or by explicit principals

class zope.security.simplepolicies.PermissiveSecurityPolicy(*participations)[source]¶

Bases: zope.security.simplepolicies.ParanoidSecurityPolicy

Allow all access.
